line_1: And ca's me a niggardly, thraw-gabbit cairly,
line_2: O, gin my wife wad drink hooly and fairly,

line_1: And ca's me a niggardly, thraw-gabbit cairly,
line_2: Hooly and fairly, hooly and fairly,
